name: Snow Queen 2: Bird and Weasel
description:
From the creators of epic animation film, Snow Queen 2, comes an all-new 3-puzzle adventure – Bird and Weasel. You will embark on a spectacular journey with exciting and challenging objectives like you have never seen before!

A snowy twist on match 3 – Switch and slide on the board of enchanted gemstones to create matches of 3 or more as you trigger cascading combos and conquer original objectives!

Winter fairytale – Begin your first chapter as Luta the weasel, journey through the map to explore the untold story, unlock her bird, find her friends (Orm and Gerda) and discover MANY other mysterious surprises!

THE BIRD’S POWER – Cast the bird’s magic to instantly vanish the colored gemstones. Unlock more unique power-ups along the way and experience Luta’s joy in these adventures!

Have fun with your friends! See their best scores on the map and challenges to show them who the best adventurer is!

Don’t forget to see Snow Queen 2 in theaters – check your local listings for showtimes!

"The Snow Queen 2", sequel to the first title of the franchise released more than in 70 countries. As a truly international project, the Snow Queen 2 will enjoy a day-and-date release in the UK, S. Korea, Poland, Middle East, Baltic States, ex-Yugoslavia and of course Russia and CIS. China, Malaysia, Turkey and many others will go theatrical with this project in winter 2015.
